card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Dread Drone
card.property: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

card.name: Hand of Emrakul
card.property: You may sacrifice four Eldrazi Spawn rather than pay Hand of Emrakul's mana cost. Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believed in a beautiful god. But this is the true face of the divine."—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Gideon Jura
card.property: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. −2: Destroy target tapped creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

card.name: Warmonger's Chariot
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best defense is a good offense.

card.name: Explosive Revelation
card.property: Choose target creature or player. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Explosive Revelation deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. Put the nonland card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Echo Mage
card.property: Level up {1}{U} ({1}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/4 {U}{U}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. LEVEL 4+ 2/5 {U}{U}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Hyena Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Soul's Attendant
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

card.name: Fleeting Distraction
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To distract an archmage would take incredible power. But for a simpleton, something sparkly will do."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Training Grounds
card.property: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under the master's eye, skills are honed sharper and spells cut deeper.

card.name: Merfolk Skyscout
card.property: Flying Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."

card.name: Grotag Siege-Runner
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ."—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

card.name: Consume the Meek
card.property: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why does it destroy? It does, and to talk of reasons wastes time and breath."—Nirthu, lone missionary

card.name: Repay in Kind
card.property: Each player's life total becomes the lowest life total among all players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sorin has gathered grudges for centuries, patiently awaiting the day he can exact the perfect vengeance.

card.name: Vengevine
card.property: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

card.name: Student of Warfare
card.property: Level up {W} ({W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-6 3/3 First strike LEVEL 7+ 4/4 Double strike

card.name: Jaddi Lifestrider
card.property: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature's arms encircle all who are willing to draw close.

card.name: Crab Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature {2}{U}: Untap enchanted creature. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Emrakul's Hatcher
card.property: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

card.name: Khalni Hydra
card.property: Khalni Hydra costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In ages past, bargains were struck and promises were made. Now we must collect on our debt. Begin the hymns."—Moruul, Khalni druid

card.name: Bloodrite Invoker
card.property: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption."—The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Repel the Darkness
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Growth Spasm
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Oust
card.property: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

card.name: Deprive
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Deprive, return a land you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That would have brought shame to you as a mage. Tell you what—I'll keep your secret."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Coralhelm Commander
card.property: Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 3/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Lightmine Field
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures attack, Lightmine Field deals damage to each of those creatures equal to the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to kill a lot of goblins, just make sure your defenses look like fun.

card.name: Knight of Cliffhaven
card.property: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying, vigilance

card.name: Gigantomancer
card.property: {1}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."

card.name: World at War
card.property: After the first postcombat main phase this turn, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

card.name: Pennon Blade
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.

card.name: Pawn of Ulamog
card.property: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Caravan Escort
card.property: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 2/2 LEVEL 5+ 5/5 First strike

card.name: Nighthaze
card.property: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To evade the brood lineages, one must be made dark to all the senses."—Traga, Zulaport runner

card.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
card.property: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token named Tuktuk the Returned.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.

card.name: Stomper Cub
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice."—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

card.name: Near-Death Experience
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.

card.name: Artisan of Kozilek
card.property: When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

card.name: Spawning Breath
card.property: Spawning Breath deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.

card.name: Sea Gate Oracle
card.property: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Bramblesnap
card.property: Trample Tap an untapped creature you control: Bramblesnap gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bramblesnap is formed by grafting together thirteen different plants that already hunger for meat.

card.name: Hedron-Field Purists
card.property: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/4 If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage. LEVEL 5+ 2/5 If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Emerge Unscathed
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside."—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

card.name: Overgrown Battlement
card.property: Defender {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each creature with defender you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies."—The War Diaries

card.name: Skeletal Wurm
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Skeletal Wurm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necromancers are judged by the most powerful undead they've ever created. There are those who have animated just a single being, yet are considered the pinnacle of their dark craft.

card.name: Luminous Wake
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If destiny's champions have arisen to fight the Ancient Ones, then let me, too, do my part."—Ravuel of Graypelt

card.name: Consuming Vapors
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Soulbound Guardians
card.property: Defender, flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor's most righteous dead are given the greatest reward: an eternity tied to the land they so cherish.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Irresistible Prey
card.property: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face—a runt meepling.

card.name: Magmaw
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw."—Jaji, magmaw worshipper

card.name: Kiln Fiend
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

card.name: Sporecap Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you."—Saidah, Joraga hunter

card.name: Kargan Dragonlord
card.property: Level up {R} ({R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-7 4/4 Flying LEVEL 8+ 8/8 Flying, trample {R}: Kargan Dragonlord gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Kor Spiritdancer
card.property: Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.

card.name: Gelatinous Genesis
card.property: Create X X/X green Ooze creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even as the world was left cracked and gory by the marauding Eldrazi, new life began to drip from its wounds.

card.name: Baneful Omen
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, each opponent loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, again it does not bode well for you."

card.name: Keening Stone
card.property: {5}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.

card.name: Death Cultist
card.property: Sacrifice Death Cultist: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.

card.name: Lust for War
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Lust for War deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.

card.name: Zof Shade
card.property: {2} {B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It haunts the remnants of the Helix of Zof, leeching strength from the vast Eldrazi ruin.

card.name: Fissure Vent
card.property: Choose one or both — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds."—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

card.name: Not of This World
card.property: Counter target spell or ability that targets a permanent you control. Not of This World costs {7} less to cast if it targets a spell or ability that targets a creature you control with power 7 or greater.

card.name: Harmless Assault
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After encasing it in a paralyzing beam of light, the angel studied the Eldrazi as a child would study a bug, curiously and without fear.

card.name: Akoum Boulderfoot
card.property: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck."—Chadir the Navigator

card.name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
card.property: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor track hartebeests in hopes of finding magic to help fight the Eldrazi.

card.name: Haze Frog
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Haze Frog enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its breath leaves its prey too drowsy to struggle.

card.name: Champion's Drake
card.property: Flying Champion's Drake gets +3/+3 as long as you control a creature with three or more level counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Fraid of heights? Ride a horse. 'Fraid of missing out? Rein up a drake."—Trinda, Hada spy patrol

card.name: Gravity Well
card.property: Whenever a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storms spread throughout Oran-Rief, ripping the skies with wind and rain. Airborne creatures sought shelter where they could.

card.name: Dormant Gomazoa
card.property: Flying Dormant Gomazoa enters the battlefield tapped. Dormant Gomazoa doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you become the target of a spell, you may untap Dormant Gomazoa.

card.name: Perish the Thought
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player shuffles that card into his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.

card.name: Lavafume Invoker
card.property: {8}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Then the ancient masters themselves, towers of rapacity, rose and began their calamitous feast."—The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
card.property: When you cast Kozilek, Butcher of Truth, draw four cards. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Kozilek is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Last Kiss
card.property: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Romanticize it, glamorize it, call it what you will. To me, it will always be carnal, bloody murder."—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scholars wept when we destroyed the hedron. I had no such pity. What would this world be like had we done so sooner?"—The War Diaries

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Daggerback Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

card.name: Angelheart Vial
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on Angelheart Vial. {2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from Angelheart Vial: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It holds a whisper from Iona: "Persevere."

card.name: Lord of Shatterskull Pass
card.property: Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-5 6/6 LEVEL 6+ 6/6 Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.

card.name: Drake Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Momentous Fall
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Momentous Fall, sacrifice a creature. You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wasn't long until the elves had developed a use for every part of the Eldrazi.

card.name: Recurring Insight
card.property: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in target opponent's hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Essence Feed
card.property: Target player loses 3 life. You gain 3 life and create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eldrazi grow wherever something else dies.

card.name: Phantasmal Abomination
card.property: Defender When Phantasmal Abomination becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Create an illusion so strong that it becomes another's reality, and you can become the master of all.

card.name: Staggershock
card.property: Staggershock deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Reinforced Bulwark
card.property: Defender {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.

card.name: Distortion Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Realms Uncharted
card.property: Search your library for up to four land cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Deathless Angel
card.property: Flying {W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I should have died that day, but I suffered not a scratch. I awoke in a lake of blood, none of it apparently my own."—The War Diaries

card.name: Surreal Memoir
card.property: Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Guard Duty
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

card.name: Ogre's Cleaver
card.property: Equipped creature gets +5/+0. Equip {5}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She adopted the weapon of the slave-lord Kazuul, and with it, all his cruelty.

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Guul Draz Assassin
card.property: Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/2 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. LEVEL 4+ 4/4 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Pelakka Wurm
card.property: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats what it wants to eat—which is anything that moves.

card.name: Surrakar Spellblade
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade. Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

card.name: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief
card.property: Flying {X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."

card.name: Survival Cache
card.property: You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Wall of Omens
card.property: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."—Expedition journal entry

card.name: Reality Spasm
card.property: Choose one — • Tap X target permanents. • Untap X target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the moment the first Eldrazi spawn squirmed free, everything on Zendikar took on an adjusted meaning, a new slant toward or away from the waking giants.

card.name: Prey's Vengeance
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Sarkhan the Mad
card.property: 0: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Sarkhan the Mad deals damage to himself equal to that card's converted mana cost. −2: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then that player creates a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. −4: Each Dragon creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player.

card.name: Renegade Doppelganger
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Renegade Doppelganger become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.

card.name: See Beyond
card.property: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

card.name: Merfolk Observer
card.property: When Merfolk Observer enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."

card.name: Joraga Treespeaker
card.property: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/2 {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool. LEVEL 5+ 1/4 Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."

card.name: Puncturing Light
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us."—Anitan, Ondu cleric

card.name: Hellion Eruption
card.property: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.

card.name: Halimar Wavewatch
card.property: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 0/6 LEVEL 5+ 6/6 Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Rapacious One
card.property: Trample Whenever Rapacious One deals combat damage to a player, create that many 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Lone Missionary
card.property: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

card.name: Nomads' Assembly
card.property: Create a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token for each creature you control. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Awakening Zone
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

card.name: Spider Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Mul Daya Channelers
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, Mul Daya Channelers gets +3/+3. As long as the top card of your library is a land card, Mul Daya Channelers has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

card.name: Conquering Manticore
card.property: Flying When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

card.name: Narcolepsy
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
card.property: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tracing their ancestry back to Zendikar's earliest forms of life, lagac lizards have seen the comings and goings of planeswalkers and the Eldrazi, and the rise of the vampire clans, none of which has changed them one bit.

card.name: Time of Heroes
card.property: Each creature you control with a level counter on it gets +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one spoke. There was no need. The threat of the Eldrazi presented a simple choice: lay down your weapons and die for nothing, or hold them fast and die for something.

card.name: Cast Through Time
card.property: Instant and sorcery spells you control have rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves if you cast it from your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Nirkana Revenant
card.property: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces). {B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which it is eternally sustained.

card.name: Pestilence Demon
card.property: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

card.name: Vent Sentinel
card.property: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."—The War Diaries

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Nirkana Cutthroat
card.property: Level up {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 4/3 Deathtouch LEVEL 3+ 5/4 First strike, deathtouch

card.name: Venerated Teacher
card.property: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."

card.name: Goblin Tunneler
card.property: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Kor Line-Slinger
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I tried to tell her to stay behind, that this fight was too dangerous. I spent the next hour tied to the rafters."—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

card.name: Devastating Summons
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Devastating Summons, sacrifice X lands. Create two X/X red Elemental creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Things born in magma are always angry.

card.name: Demystify
card.property: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Singing City was silent, the pathway stones were still, and the winds of the Howling Spire ceased.

card.name: Ancient Stirrings
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

card.name: Nest Invader
card.property: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

card.name: Induce Despair
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Induce Despair, reveal a creature card from your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the angel saw was her doom.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Dreamstone Hedron
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

card.name: Makindi Griffin
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

card.name: Enatu Golem
card.property: When Enatu Golem dies, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Golems conjured from the debris of Enatu Temple provided a sturdy but expendable first line of defense against the Eldrazi.

card.name: Broodwarden
card.property: Eldrazi Spawn creatures you control get +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The least of gods shall tower over the mightiest of mortals, and death shall reign over all."—Crypt of Agadeem inscription

card.name: Enclave Cryptologist
card.property: Level up {1}{U} ({1}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 0/1 {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. LEVEL 3+ 0/1 {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Snake Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Eel Umbra
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Gravitational Shift
card.property: Creatures with flying get +2/+0. Creatures without flying get -2/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.

card.name: Flame Slash
card.property: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

card.name: Kazandu Tuskcaller
card.property: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-5 1/1 {T}: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. LEVEL 6+ 1/1 {T}: Create two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens.

card.name: Lighthouse Chronologist
card.property: Level up {U} ({U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-6 2/4 LEVEL 7+ 3/5 At the beginning of each end step, if it's not your turn, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Ulamog's Crusher
card.property: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us."—Nirthu, lone missionary

card.name: Soulsurge Elemental
card.property: First strike Soulsurge Elemental's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It draws its strength from those around it, but the pleasure of destruction is all its own.

card.name: Ondu Giant
card.property: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

card.name: Battle Rampart
card.property: Defender {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword."—Yannash, outpost builder

card.name: Might of the Masses
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

card.name: Zulaport Enforcer
card.property: Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 3/3 LEVEL 3+ 5/5 Zulaport Enforcer can't be blocked except by black creatures.

card.name: Beastbreaker of Bala Ged
card.property: Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/4 LEVEL 4+ 6/6 Trample

card.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.

card.name: Dawnglare Invoker
card.property: Flying {8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error."—The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Hedron Matrix
card.property: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.

card.name: Contaminated Ground
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Na Plateau is lost. Do not ask what happened, and never return there."—Nirthu, lone missionary

card.name: Raid Bombardment
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to defending player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

card.name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.property: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."—The War Diaries

card.name: Cadaver Imp
card.property: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

card.name: Arrogant Bloodlord
card.property: Whenever Arrogant Bloodlord blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy Arrogant Bloodlord at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would rather take my own head than be thwarted by a presumptuous wretch with a shield and a dream."

card.name: Hellcarver Demon
card.property: Flying Whenever Hellcarver Demon deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice all other permanents you control and discard your hand. Exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Regress
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever."—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

card.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

card.name: Gloomhunter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Skittering Invasion
card.property: Create five 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The brood spread far faster than we could kill it. I fear the worst is yet to come."—The War Diaries

card.name: Spawnsire of Ulamog
card.property: Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.) {4}: Create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool." {20}: Cast any number of Eldrazi cards you own from outside the game without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Umbra Mystic
card.property: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor. (If an enchanted permanent you control would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy an Aura attached to it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have found the courage to face death—twice, if I must."

card.name: Brimstone Mage
card.property: Level up {3}{R} ({3}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/3 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 1 damage to target creature or player. LEVEL 3+ 2/4 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Null Champion
card.property: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/2 LEVEL 4+ 7/3 {B}: Regenerate Null Champion.

card.name: Vendetta
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider my debt to your kin paid in full."—Idrol, Guul Draz assassin

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Heat Ray
card.property: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth."—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Unified Will
card.property: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure."—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: All Is Dust
card.property: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets."—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Rage Nimbus
card.property: Defender, flying {1}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The settlement knew there was something strange about the cloud when the old priest Mandli suddenly grabbed an axe and ran screaming into the hills.

card.name: Kozilek's Predator
card.property: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

card.name: Affa Guard Hound
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

card.name: Corpsehatch
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Frostwind Invoker
card.property: Flying {8}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi."—The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Kabira Vindicator
card.property: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-4 3/6 Other creatures you control get +1/+1. LEVEL 5+ 4/8 Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Splinter Twin
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a token that's a copy of this creature. That token has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know just the person for that job."

card.name: Shared Discovery
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Shared Discovery, tap four untapped creatures you control. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.

card.name: Domestication
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

card.name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
card.property: Flying Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

card.name: Shrivel
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us."—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

card.name: Eldrazi Temple
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.

card.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: It That Betrays
card.property: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.

card.name: Demonic Appetite
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Morality is just shorthand for the constraints of being powerless."—Ob Nixilis

card.name: Virulent Swipe
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Traitorous Instinct
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.

card.name: Sphinx of Magosi
card.property: Flying {2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

card.name: Leaf Arrow
card.property: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken."—Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru

card.name: Living Destiny
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Living Destiny, reveal a creature card from your hand. You gain life equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That our enemies are great only brings us greater hope."

card.name: Escaped Null
card.property: Lifelink Whenever Escaped Null blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left masterless by Kozilek, it wandered the wilds, raving in its ceaseless hunger.

card.name: Disaster Radius
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Disaster Radius, reveal a creature card from your hand. Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Ogre Sentry
card.property: Defender

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?"—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Suffer the Past
card.property: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.

card.name: Skywatcher Adept
card.property: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/2 Flying LEVEL 3+ 4/2 Flying

card.name: Thought Gorger
card.property: Trample When Thought Gorger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card in your hand. If you do, discard your hand. When Thought Gorger leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Stalwart Shield-Bearers
card.property: Defender Other creatures you control with defender get +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold fast the line! Either we stop them here or we wake up in their guts!"—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

card.name: Curse of Wizardry
card.property: As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must all push through the pain to heal our world."—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Bear Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Boar Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."

card.name: Transcendent Master
card.property: Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 6-11 6/6 Lifelink LEVEL 12+ 9/9 Lifelink, indestructible

card.name: Hada Spy Patrol
card.property: Level up {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/2 Hada Spy Patrol can't be blocked. LEVEL 3+ 3/3 Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Hada Spy Patrol can't be blocked.

card.name: Pathrazer of Ulamog
card.property: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.) Pathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

card.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
card.property: When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent. Indestructible Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Wildheart Invoker
card.property: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."—The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Brood Birthing
card.property: If you control an Eldrazi Spawn, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool." Otherwise, create one of those tokens.

card.name: Valakut Fireboar
card.property: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just move very slowly, and for the love of Ula, do not get it mad."—Chadir the Navigator

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Goblin Arsonist
card.property: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

card.name: Prophetic Prism
card.property: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

card.name: Tajuru Preserver
card.property: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No more blood shall be spilled to satisfy another's deluded lust for power."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In one gargantuan bite, it will swallow not only you but also the riverbank you were standing on.

card.name: Guard Gomazoa
card.property: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

card.name: Forked Bolt
card.property: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Mortician Beetle
card.property: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.

card.name: Aura Finesse
card.property: Attach target Aura you control to target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although armor and auras can be similar, the brains required to use them are worlds apart."—Zilan, Makindi auramancer

card.name: Eland Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+4. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Mnemonic Wall
card.property: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could."—Mzali, Lighthouse archmage

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Lay Bare
card.property: Counter target spell. Look at its controller's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others."—Jace Beleren

card.name: Eldrazi Conscription
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barest taste of Eldrazi power shatters both realms and identities.

card.name: Aura Gnarlid
card.property: Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it. Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

card.name: Smite
card.property: Destroy target blocked creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mighty rely solely on their strength. They are shocked when we do the same."—Tars Olan, kor world-gift

card.name: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
card.property: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn can't be countered. When you cast Emrakul, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6 When Emrakul is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.property: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

card.name: Mammoth Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Ikiral Outrider
card.property: Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/6 Vigilance LEVEL 4+ 3/10 Vigilance
